```scss
// Property: method
// Description: Method by which this reminder will be delivered.
// Component(s): Ti.Calendar.Reminder
'.method-calendar-alert': { method: Ti.Calendar.METHOD_ALERT }
'.method-calendar': { method: Ti.Calendar.METHOD_DEFAULT }
'.method-calendar-email': { method: Ti.Calendar.METHOD_EMAIL }
'.method-calendar-sms': { method: Ti.Calendar.METHOD_SMS }
```
